summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the construction of a bridge across the Lake Washington Canal at Montlake Boulevard, authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to prepare and adopt plans and specifications therefor and proceed with the construction thereof, making an appropriation therefor, and appropriating Five Hundred Thousand ($500,000) Dollars from the Seattle Bridge Bonds, Series C, 1924 Construction Fund to the Seattle Bridge Bonds, Series D, 1924 Construction Fund as a temporary loan.
